com.mygame.interfaces

Interface Attackable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Player, Slime

    public interface Attackable
    Consists of health and exp getters and also health modifiers like hit procedure, that is for subtracting health from attackable object. It's having getter and setter for hit flag which is useful for texts events after being hit. Moreover it stores position of hp bar and state of an attackable object (which can be either dead or alive)
